data.actual_result: instead of the name, it sais "null"
data.expected_result: it should tell the name of the user u added perms to
data.short_description: [Audit Log] editing channel perms for a user will show the user's name as "null" in the expanded entry
data.steps_to_repro: - create a new channel - add a user to channel permissions and give him one perm - save - go to channel permissions of that user again and give him a second perm - save - go to audit logs - expand latest entry
